description: Fuel Pressure Regulator 1 - Forced Engine Shutdown
symptoms:
No start condition
Engine misfire codes and idle control codes may also accompany a P228A
Diminished fuel efficiency
Delayed startup when the engine is cool
Black smoke from the exhaust system
causes:
Low engine oil pressure/level
Mis-timed engine
Faulty fuel pressure sensor
Defective fuel pressure regulator
Shorted or open wiring and/or connectors in the fuel pressure regulator control circuit
Bad PCM or a PCM programming error
